attributes.description: Fantastic Fuel Consumption. With mileage BELOW 30000KM. It is in Excellent condition and with its great comfort feel, it perfect for anyone who wants to be in an Uber business or wants a Run Around vehicle. Service History Available. It has Specs and extra features including Clothed Seats, AUX/USB, Tinted Glass, Bluetooth Connectivity and Spare Keys.  All the vehicles that we place on Cars have gone through a rigorous mechanical inspection by one of our car experts as well. Any vehicle bought from us will receive a Premium Valet to the value of R750 before delivery. We take pride in being a family owned and operated business that always refer to our founding principles of integrity, honesty and fairness. With those principles in mind we set out with a customer-centric approach that allows ease of access to the vehicle of your dreams just 5 days or less. We connect customers to any of the major financial institutions in South Africa with an 87% approval rate for potential family members that meet the minimum requirements for financing. With us Service is not a Department, it's in our DNA! We welcome Trade-ins! Trading Hours: Monday - Friday : 8AM to 5PM Saturday & Public Holiday : 8AM to 1PM Sunday : CLOSED Price EXCLUDES Administration, License and Registration Fees.
